description:
About BroadcastMed

BroadcastMed is the leading healthcare marketplace that provides trusted clinical content, powerful engagement and industry insights to healthcare professionals, medical institutions and manufacturers, service providers and pharmaceutical companies. The company’s integrated platform of digital, event, and publication solutions helps drive better dialogue, connectivity, and outcomes for the healthcare community.

About the Role:

We are seeking a talented AI Content Specialist to join our dynamic medical publishing team. You will be responsible for creating engaging and high-quality content using artificial intelligence technologies. You should have a strong background in natural language processing and a creative flair to produce content that resonates with a healthcare audience. The ideal candidate is passionate about the intersection between technology and communications and is keen to stay up-to-date on AI advancements.

Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand content requirements.
• Utilize AI tools to generate compelling and coherent written content.
• Refine and optimize AI-generated content to align with brand voice and messaging.
• Stay informed about the latest developments in AI and language technologies.
• Monitor news and advancements in the healthcare space.
• Other reporting and writing duties as assigned.

Qualifications:
• Education: Bachelor's degree in journalism, communications, English, computer science, linguistics, or a related field.
• Experience with natural language processing and AI content generation.
• Ability to understand and adapt to evolving AI technologies.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• Understanding of the fast-paced nature of news and information.
• Deadline-driven mindset.
• 1-3 years experience in a related field.

Preferred Experience, Knowledge, and Abilities:
• Demonstrated experience creating content in medical publishing or similar organizations.

Equal Employment Opportunity Policy

BroadcastMed provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.
